001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit;
002
003import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.FileUtils;
004import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.Yaml;
005import org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration;
006import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
007import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
008
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Objects;
015import java.util.Set;
016
017/**
018 * This class implements {@link Yaml} on Bukkit.
019 * <p>
020 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
021 */
022public class BukkitYaml implements Yaml {
023
024    protected final Path filePath;
025    protected YamlConfiguration config;
026
027    /**
028     * Creates an {@link BukkitYaml} with no default values.
029     * <p>
030     * This constructor loads the file automatically.
031     *
032     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
033     */
034    public BukkitYaml(@NotNull Path filePath) {
035        this(filePath, true);
036        config = null;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Creates an {@link BukkitYaml} with no default values.
041     *
042     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
043     * @param autoLoad True if automatically load, false otherwise.
044     */
045    public BukkitYaml(@NotNull Path filePath, boolean autoLoad) {
046        Objects.requireNonNull(filePath, "filePath must not be null.");
047
048        this.filePath = filePath;
049        if (autoLoad) load();
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Loads a yaml file.
054     * <p>
055     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
056     *
057     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
058     */
059    @Override
060    public boolean load() {
061        if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
062            config = YamlConfiguration.loadConfiguration(filePath.toFile());
063            return true;
064        } else {
065            return false;
066        }
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Checks if the file is loaded.
071     *
072     * @return True if the file is loaded or false if it is not loaded.
073     */
074    @Override
075    public boolean isLoaded() {
076        return config != null;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Save to yaml file.
081     * <p>
082     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
083     *
084     * @return True if the save is successful or false if it is failure.
085     */
086    @Override
087    public boolean save() {
088        try {
089            if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
090                getConfig().save(filePath.toFile());
091                return true;
092            }
093        } catch (IOException e) {
094            e.printStackTrace();
095        }
096        return false;
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Get the path to a yaml file.
101     *
102     * @return The path to a yaml file.
103     */
104    @Override
105    @NotNull
106    public Path getPath() {
107        return filePath;
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * Gets {@link YamlConfiguration}.
112     *
113     * @return {@link YamlConfiguration}
114     * @throws IllegalStateException Throws when a yaml file is not loaded.
115     */
116    @NotNull
117    public YamlConfiguration getConfig() throws IllegalStateException {
118        if (isLoaded()) {
119            return config;
120        } else {
121            throw new IllegalStateException("A yaml file is not loaded.");
122        }
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
127     * <p>
128     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns {@code false}.
129     *
130     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
131     * @return Requested boolean.
132     */
133    @Override
134    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path) {
135        return getBoolean(path, false);
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
140     *
141     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
142     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
143     * @return Requested boolean.
144     */
145    @Override
146    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path, boolean def) {
147        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
148        return isLoaded() ? config.getBoolean(path, def) : def;
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Gets the requested double by path.
153     * <p>
154     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
155     *
156     * @param path Path of the double to get.
157     * @return Requested double.
158     */
159    @Override
160    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path) {
161        return getDouble(path, 0);
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * Gets the requested double by path.
166     *
167     * @param path Path of the double to get.
168     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
169     * @return Requested double.
170     */
171    @Override
172    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path, double def) {
173        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
174        return isLoaded() ? config.getDouble(path, def) : def;
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Gets the requested integer by path.
179     * <p>
180     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
181     *
182     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
183     * @return Requested integer.
184     */
185    @Override
186    public int getInt(@NotNull String path) {
187        return getInt(path, 0);
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * Gets the requested integer by path.
192     *
193     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
194     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
195     * @return Requested integer.
196     */
197    @Override
198    public int getInt(@NotNull String path, int def) {
199        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
200        return isLoaded() ? config.getInt(path, def) : def;
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * Gets the requested long by path.
205     * <p>
206     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
207     *
208     * @param path Path of the long to get.
209     * @return Requested long.
210     */
211    @Override
212    public long getLong(@NotNull String path) {
213        return getLong(path, 0);
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Gets the requested long by path.
218     *
219     * @param path Path of the long to get.
220     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
221     * @return Requested long.
222     */
223    @Override
224    public long getLong(@NotNull String path, long def) {
225        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
226        return isLoaded() ? config.getLong(path, def) : def;
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Gets the requested string by path.
231     * <p>
232     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string.
233     *
234     * @param path Path of the string to get.
235     * @return Requested string.
236     */
237    @Override
238    @NotNull
239    public String getString(@NotNull String path) {
240        return getString(path, "");
241    }
242
243    /**
244     * Gets the requested string by path.
245     *
246     * @param path Path of the string to get.
247     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
248     * @return Requested string.
249     */
250    @Override
251    @NotNull
252    public String getString(@NotNull String path, @NotNull String def) {
253        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
254        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
255
256        String value = isLoaded() ? config.getString(path, def) : null;
257        return value != null ? value : def;
258    }
259
260    /**
261     * Gets the requested string list by path.
262     * <p>
263     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string list.
264     *
265     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
266     * @return Requested string list.
267     */
268    @Override
269    @NotNull
270    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path) {
271        return getStringList(path, new ArrayList<>());
272    }
273
274    /**
275     * Gets the requested string list by path.
276     *
277     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
278     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
279     * @return Requested string list.
280     */
281    @Override
282    @NotNull
283    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<String> def) {
284        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
285        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
286        return isLoaded() ? config.getStringList(path) : def;
287    }
288
289    /**
290     * Gets the requested short list by path.
291     * <p>
292     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty short list.
293     *
294     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
295     * @return Requested short list.
296     */
297    @Override
298    @NotNull
299    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path) {
300        return getShortList(path, new ArrayList<>());
301    }
302
303    /**
304     * Gets the requested short list by path.
305     *
306     * @param path Path of the short list to get.
307     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
308     * @return Requested short list.
309     */
310    @Override
311    @NotNull
312    public List<Short> getShortList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Short> def) {
313        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
314        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
315        return isLoaded() ? config.getShortList(path) : def;
316    }
317
318    /**
319     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
320     * <p>
321     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty integer list.
322     *
323     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
324     * @return Requested integer list.
325     */
326    @Override
327    @NotNull
328    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path) {
329        return getIntegerList(path, new ArrayList<>());
330    }
331
332    /**
333     * Gets the requested integer list by path.
334     *
335     * @param path Path of the integer list to get.
336     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
337     * @return Requested integer list.
338     */
339    @Override
340    @NotNull
341    public List<Integer> getIntegerList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Integer> def) {
342        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
343        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
344        return isLoaded() ? config.getIntegerList(path) : def;
345    }
346
347    /**
348     * Gets the requested long list by path.
349     * <p>
350     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty long list.
351     *
352     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
353     * @return Requested long list.
354     */
355    @Override
356    @NotNull
357    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path) {
358        return getLongList(path, new ArrayList<>());
359    }
360
361    /**
362     * Gets the requested long list by path.
363     *
364     * @param path Path of the long list to get.
365     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
366     * @return Requested long list.
367     */
368    @Override
369    @NotNull
370    public List<Long> getLongList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Long> def) {
371        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
372        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
373        return isLoaded() ? config.getLongList(path) : def;
374    }
375
376    /**
377     * Gets the requested float list by path.
378     * <p>
379     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty float list.
380     *
381     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
382     * @return Requested float list.
383     */
384    @Override
385    @NotNull
386    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path) {
387        return getFloatList(path, new ArrayList<>());
388    }
389
390    /**
391     * Gets the requested float list by path.
392     *
393     * @param path Path of the float list to get.
394     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
395     * @return Requested float list.
396     */
397    @Override
398    @NotNull
399    public List<Float> getFloatList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Float> def) {
400        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
401        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
402        return isLoaded() ? config.getFloatList(path) : def;
403    }
404
405    /**
406     * Gets the requested double list by path.
407     * <p>
408     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty double list.
409     *
410     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
411     * @return Requested double list.
412     */
413    @Override
414    @NotNull
415    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path) {
416        return getDoubleList(path, new ArrayList<>());
417    }
418
419    /**
420     * Gets the requested double list by path.
421     *
422     * @param path Path of the double list to get.
423     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
424     * @return Requested double list.
425     */
426    @Override
427    @NotNull
428    public List<Double> getDoubleList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<Double> def) {
429        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
430        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
431        return isLoaded() ? config.getDoubleList(path) : def;
432    }
433
434    /**
435     * Gets a set containing keys in this yaml file.
436     * <p>
437     * The returned set does not include deep key.
438     *
439     * @return Set of keys contained within this yaml file.
440     */
441    @Override
442    @NotNull
443    public Set<String> getKeys() {
444        return isLoaded() ? config.getKeys(false) : new LinkedHashSet<>();
445    }
446
447    /**
448     * Set the value to the specified path.
449     * <p>
450     * If given value is null, the path will be removed.
451     *
452     * @param path  Path of the object to set.
453     * @param value New value to set the path to.
454     */
455    @Override
456    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
457        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
458
459        if (isLoaded()) {
460            config.set(path, value);
461        }
462    }
463}
